ref: 3456 kr̥sará -- , kr̥ś˚ m. ʻ a dish of sesamum and grain, rice and peas and spices ʼ Kauś., kr̥sara -- n. MBh., ˚rā -- f. Suśr. [Cf. *khēsārī -- ?]
Pk. kisara -- n. ʻ sesamum with rice and milk, rice and lentils ʼ, ˚rā -- f. ʻ rice and lentils ʼ;
Sh. (Lor.) kisīri ʻ rice and lentils ʼ (< *kirsariā?).
